name: TwentyQuestions
description:
A short narrative game made in three hours for #trijam 142, with the theme "True or False". Answer the questions, get to the truth. 

Content Warning: some of the themes might be disturbing.

All assets have been made by me during the three hours of development, except for the font, which is Classic Console by deejayy.hu.

Controls:

Left and right to move the hand

Down to press the button

The green circle means TRUE, the red cross means FALSE

Tools used:

Game developed with Godot Engine.

The sprites were made with Aseprite.

The sounds were created with LMMS using the BitInvader instrument.
